noun.description: The moving of something from its place or position.
examples: a displacement of the vertebra at the bottom of the spine

noun.description: The occupation by a submerged body or part of a body of a volume which would otherwise be occupied by a fluid.
The unconscious transfer of an intense emotion from its original object to another one.
examples: this phobia was linked with the displacement of fear of his father

noun.description: The component of an electric field due to free separated charges, regardless of any polarizing effects.
